results.definition: attractiveness that interests or pleases or stimulates
examples: his smile was part of his appeal to her

results.definition: request for a sum of money
examples: an appeal to raise money for starving children
an appeal to the public to keep calm
The idea of a vacation appeals to me

results.definition: request earnestly (something from somebody); ask for aid or protection
cite as an authority; resort to
examples: I appealed to the law of 1900

results.definition: (law) a legal proceeding in which the appellant resorts to a higher court for the purpose of obtaining a review of a lower court decision and a reversal of the lower court's judgment or the granting of a new trial
examples: their appeal was denied in the superior court

results.definition: take a court case to a higher court for review
examples: He was found guilty but appealed immediately
